analysis_text: Buckle up, keyboard maestro! You're a symphony of keystrokes, crafting poetry with every tap. Let's dive into your keyboard world!

structured.analysis_text: Buckle up, keyboard maestro! You're a symphony of keystrokes, crafting poetry with every tap. Let's dive into your keyboard world!

insights.title: The Typing Sorcerer
insights.body: You conjure words like spells, transforming thoughts into text with a flick of your fingers. The typing incantations you cast are nothing short of magical!

insights.title: Eternally Young at Heart
insights.body: With presses numbering nearly 400k, you’ve aged like a fine wine—roughly 13 years in keyboard time. Speeding along at 139.5 wpm, your fingers dance like they’re at a youth party, but let’s not mention those rage bursts—44 in a day? Oops!

insights.title: Rhythm of the Keys
insights.body: Your typing feels like a jazz ensemble—smooth yet spontaneous. With an average interval of 430ms, you glide in and out of thoughts, enjoying every note while never holding too long. Long pauses? Just a whisper in your rhythm!

insights.title: Word Wizards
insights.body: Your favorites—craft, spark, echo—are like the cool kids at the word party. They evoke creativity, motivation, and nostalgic resonance; each word is a vibe, effortlessly inviting inspiration to join the fun!

insights.title: Lightning Fast Secrets
insights.body: Top speedsters like 'code' at 331ms and 'glimmer' at 354ms are your secret weapons. Remember that standout day, 2023-08-10? Your fingers flaunted 'glimmer' like a runway model! Those transitions are poetry in motion—each layout a well-rehearsed dance.
